metadata.inclusion:
To add or include the HDL-7300SK into a Z-Wave network
1. Set the controller in inclusion mode.
2. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [REG 1] button.
3. Press the [1][4] button after pressing the [*] button.
metadata.exclusion:
To remove or exclude the HDL-7300SK into a Z-Wave network
1. Set the controller in exclusion mode.
2. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [REG 1] button.
3. Press the [3][6] button after pressing the [*] button.
metadata.reset:
To Factory Reset
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor body and press the [REG 1] button.
2. Press the [8][0] button after pressing the [*] button.
